title: Dialogue Practice
description: Practice simple lifestyle and shopping dialogues.

steps.pinyin: A: nǐ jīn tiān chī shén me?
B: wǒ chī sān míng zhì.
A: nǐ cháng cháng zài jiā zhǔ fàn ma?
steps.english_hint: Do you often cook at home?

steps.pinyin: B: bù cháng, wǒ bǐ jiào xǐ huān wài shí.
steps.english_hint: Not often, I prefer eating out.

steps.pinyin: A: jīn tiān de tiān qì hěn hǎo.
steps.english_hint: The weather is very good today.

steps.pinyin: B: duì, wǒ xiǎng qù sàn bù.
steps.english_hint: Yes, I want to take a walk.

steps.pinyin: A: nǐ yào mǎi shén me?
steps.english_hint: What do you want to buy?

steps.pinyin: B: wǒ xiǎng mǎi xīn xié zi.
steps.english_hint: I want to buy new shoes.

steps.pinyin: A: nà biān yǒu yì jiā pián yí de diàn.
steps.english_hint: There's a cheap store over there.

steps.pinyin: B: tài hǎo le, wǒ men qù kàn kàn!
steps.english_hint: Great, let's go check it out!

review.summary: You completed Chapter 5! You learned food, shopping, lifestyle, adjectives, comparisons and dialogues.
review.mission: Next chapter: Chapter 6 — Home, family, hobbies & simple past tense.
